Title: Requires notification of tenants for impending conversions and bona fide offers to purchase to include the rights and responsibilities of tenants
Summary: Requires notification of tenants for impending conversions and bona fide offers to purchase to include the rights and responsibilities of tenants issued with the original lease.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring notification of tenants for impending conversions and bona fide offers to purchase to include the rights and responsibilities of tenants
